original_title: Lots and Lots of Playful Penguins and Their Toe-Tappin' Feet
overview: Have fun learning everything there is to know about all 17 kinds of penguins, fun songs, trivia and more!! Featuring incredible close-up video footage of penguins in their natural and captive habitats it's a perfect gift for penguin lovers of all ages! Listen to their real life calls, cries and watch their funny moves, it's fascinating! Award-Winner! Sing-along songs by James Coffey! Kids love it!
title: Lots and Lots of Playful Penguins and Their Toe-Tappin' Feet
